original_text: My children, I feel like a mother who is giving birth to you again. I will continue to feel that kind of pain until you become more completely like Christ.
korean_text: 나의 자녀들아 너희 속에 그리스도의 형상을 이루기까지 다시 너희를 위하여 해산하는 수고를 하노니

sentences.original_text: who is giving birth to you again
I will continue to feel that kind of pain
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그러한 고통을 계속 느낄 것입니다

sentences.original_text: until you become more completely like Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 그리스도를 더 완전히 닮을 때까지
